column1: *Note: Each variable has codes represented below and in the corresponding database.
Each variable is represented by five columns in the database, with five corresponding field headings differing in their final character, as described below.
Where the database cells are blank, numeric representations were not applicable.
Type of Community District Tabulation Area (Community District or Joint Interest Area)
INCOME IN THE PAST 12 MONTHS IS BELOW THE POVERTY LEVEL
Population for whom poverty status is determined
RATIO OF INCOME TO POVERTY LEVEL
Population for whom poverty status is determined
